00078  inline void SetSaveHistoryMode(const Standard_Boolean theSaveHistory,

00093   inline Standard_Boolean GetModifiedShape(const TopoDS_Shape& theOldShape,
00094                                            TopoDS_Shape& theNewShape)
00095   {
00096     Standard_Boolean isModif = (!myMapModifications.IsEmpty() &&
00097                                 myMapModifications.IsBound(theOldShape));
00098     if(isModif)
00099       theNewShape = myMapModifications.Find(theOldShape);
00100     else
00101           theNewShape = theOldShape;
00102         return isModif;
00103   }
00104 
00106   inline Standard_Boolean isDone()
00107   {
00108         return myDone;
00109   }
